participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

Levels.0: I do not feel sad.
Levels.1: I feel sad much of the time.
Levels.2: I am sad all the time.
Levels.3: I am so sad or unhappy that I can't stand it.

Levels.0: I am not discouraged about my future.
Levels.1: I feel more discouraged about my future than I used to be.
Levels.2: I do not expect things to work out for me.
Levels.3: I feel my future is hopeless and will only get worse.

Levels.0: I do not feel like a failure.
Levels.1: I have failed more than I should have.
Levels.2: As I look back, I see a lot of failures.
Levels.3: I feel I am a total failure as a person.

Levels.0: I get as much pleasure as I ever did from the things I enjoy.
Levels.1: I don't enjoy things as much as I used to.
Levels.2: I get very little pleasure from the things I used to enjoy.
Levels.3: I can't get any pleasure from the things I used to enjoy.

Levels.0: I don't feel particularly guilty.
Levels.1: I feel guilty over many things I have done or should have done.
Levels.2: I feel quite guilty most of the time.
Levels.3: I feel guilty all of the time.

Levels.0: I don't feel I am being punished.
Levels.1: I feel I may be punished.
Levels.2: I expect to be punished.
Levels.3: I feel I am being punished.

Levels.0: I feel the same about myself as ever.
Levels.1: I have lost confidence in myself.
Levels.2: I am disappointed in myself.
Levels.3: I dislike myself.

Levels.0: I don't criticize or blame myself more than usual.
Levels.1: I am more critical of myself than I used to be.
Levels.2: I criticize myself for all of my faults.
Levels.3: I blame myself for everything bad that happens.

Levels.0: I don't have any thoughts of killing myself.
Levels.1: I have thoughts of killing myself, but I would not carry them out.
Levels.2: I would like to kill myself.
Levels.3: I would kill myself if I had the chance

Levels.0: I don't cry anymore than I used to.
Levels.1: I cry more than I used to.
Levels.2: I cry over every little thing.
Levels.3: I feel like crying, but I can't.

Levels.0: I am no more restless or wound up than usual.
Levels.1: I feel more restless or wound up than usual.
Levels.2: I am so restless or agitated that it's hard to stay still.
Levels.3: I am so restless or agitated that I have to keep moving or doing something.

Levels.0: I have not lost interest in other people or activities.
Levels.1: I am less interested in other people or things than before.
Levels.2: I have lost most of my interest in other people or things.
Levels.3: It's hard to get interested in anything.

Levels.0: I make decisions about as well as ever
Levels.1: I find it more difficult to make decisions than usual.
Levels.2: I have much greater difficulty in making decisions than I used to.
Levels.3: I have trouble making any decisions.

Levels.0: I do not feel I am worthless.
Levels.1: I don't consider myself as worthwhile and useful as I used to.
Levels.2: I feel more worthless as compared to other people.
Levels.3: I feel utterly worthless.

Levels.0: I have as much energy as ever.
Levels.1: I have less energy than I used to have.
Levels.2: I don't have enough energy to do very much.
Levels.3: I don't have enough energy to do anything.

Levels.0: I have not experienced any change in my sleeping pattern.
Levels.1: I sleep somewhat less than usual.
Levels.2: I sleep a lot less than usual.
Levels.3: I wake up 1-2 hours early and can't get back to sleep.

Levels.0: I am no more irritable than usual.
Levels.1: I am more irritable than usual.
Levels.2: I am much more irritable than usual.
Levels.3: I am irritable all the time.

Levels.0: I have not experienced any change in my appetite.
Levels.1: My appetite is somewhat greater than usual.
Levels.2: My appetite is much greater than usual.
Levels.3: I crave food all the time

Levels.0: I can concentrate as well as ever.
Levels.1: I can't concentrate as well as usual.
Levels.2: It's hard to keep my mind on anything for very long.
Levels.3: I find I can't concentrate on anything.

Levels.0: I am no more tired or fatigued than usual.
Levels.1: I get more tired or fatigued more easily than usual.
Levels.2: I am too tired or fatigued to do a lot of the things I used to do.
Levels.3: I am too tired or fatigued to do most of the things I used to do.

Levels.0: I have not noticed any recent change in my interest in sex.
Levels.1: I am less interested in sex than I used to be.
Levels.2: I am much less interested in sex now.
Levels.3: I have lost interest in sex completely.

DBDI_22.Description: Sum of scores of items 1-21. Items are scored on a 4-point scale from 0 to 3 for a minimum score of 0 to a maximum score of 63. Clinical interpretation of total scores uses the following guidelines: 0 to 13 (minimal depression), 14 to 19 (mild depression), 20 to 28 (moderate depression), and 29 to 63 (severe depression). | Calculation = [DBDI_01]+[DBDI_02]+[DBDI_03]+[DBDI_04]+[DBDI_05]+[DBDI_06]+[DBDI_07]+[DBDI_08]+[DBDI_09]+[DBDI_10]+[DBDI_11]+[DBDI_12]+[DBDI_13]+[DBDI_14]+[DBDI_15]+[DBDI_16]+[DBDI_17]+[DBDI_18]+[DBDI_19]+[DBDI_20]+[DBDI_21]
